A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It seems like the second movie in this trilogy lost some of the luster the first one had. I don't want to spoil anything but characters that were set up in the last movie and in this one have no payoff\, and interjected love feels forced. It's still enjoyable and I recommend it if you like the series but just don't go in thinking it's going to be the best of the series
